info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 6:53PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pierce County through 730 PM EDT... At 653 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Offerman, or near Patterson, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Blackshear, Patterson, Offerman and Bristol. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
